CommandButton.Name: Vendor Items
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Will sell all items on your Vendor list.

checkbox.Name: StatusMerchant
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Check to sell Status Items to a Status Merchant.

checkbox.Name: SellTreasured
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Check to sell ALL for sale TREASURED Items to a Merchant.

checkbox.Name: SellAdeptI
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Check to sell ALL for sale Adept I Items to a Merchant.

checkbox.Name: UseHarvestDepot
checkbox.Text: Place Items in Supply Depot after Retrevial.

CommandButton.Name: Inventory List
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Outputs Current Inventory to Log Window

CommandButton.Name: Vendor Items Add
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Adds The selected Item to the Vendor Item List.

CommandButton.Name: Destroy Items Add
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Adds The selected Item to the Destroy List

CommandButton.Name: Custom Items Add
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Adds The selected Item to the Custom List

CommandButton.Name: Depot Items Add
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Adds The selected Item to the Supply Depot List

CommandButton.Name: Vendor Items List
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Outputs the Vendor List to Log Window

CommandButton.Name: Vendor Items Remove
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Removes The selected Item from the Vendor Item List.

CommandButton.Name: Destroy Items List
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Outputs the Destroy List to Log Window

CommandButton.Name: Destroy Items Remove
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Removes The selected Item from the Destroy Item List.

CommandButton.Name: Custom Items List
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Outputs the Custom List to Log Window

CommandButton.Name: Custom Items Remove
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Removes The selected Item from the Custom Item List.

CommandButton.Name: Depot Items List
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Outputs the Depot List to Log Window

CommandButton.Name: Depot Items Remove
CommandButton.AutoTooltip: Removes The selected Item from the Sepot Item List.
